title: Jean Lafitte National Historical Park and Preserve: Virtual Tour
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour              Barataria Preserve Virtual Tour         Enjoy Louisiana's wetlands without ever leaving home by taking a virtual tour of the Barataria Preserve.   Take a virtual stroll through forest, swamp, and marsh on the Barataria Preserve audio tour. Walk down the Bayou Coquille Trail past live oaks and baldcypress trees. Take a right on the Marsh Overlook Trail and learn about Louisiana's disappearing wetlands, alligators, and the preserve's flotant marsh. To hear the tour, call 504-799-0802 (long distance or cell phone charges may apply). Enter the stop number for the stop you want to hear; for example, press 1 to hear stop 1. Press *0 to leave a comment.  Tour Stop 1: Names and Places Tour Stop 2: Barataria Live Oaks Tour Stop 3: Lumbering Tour Stop 4: Invasive Species Tour Stop 5: Disappearing Wetlands Tour Stop 6: Alligators Tour Stop 7: The Flotant Marsh  To see what you'd see at each tour stop, follow the photos in the Barataria Preserve Virtual Tour photo gallery below---don't forget to look for alligators!                         Barataria Preserve Virtual Tour   7 Photos  Virtual tour of the Barataria Preserve
